_header: Men write of old how measure is treasure
_description: ‘Mesour is Tresour’, by John Lydgate — nineteen 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

BLHar2255.First Lines:
Men wryte of Oold how mesour is tresourAnd of al grace ground moost
                    principall…
BLHar2255.Last Lines:
…to letyn in folk that of gentilnesselyst hem governe Iustly
                    be mesure
